articles.title: Newly appointed Marc Llistosella not to join Tata Motors as CEO and MD - Indiainfoline
articles.description: Llistosella was earlier scheduled to join Tata Motors as CEO and MD from July 01, 2021.
articles.content: Tata Group's automobile flagship, Tata Motors has announced that the newly appointed CEO and Managing Director (MD), Marc Llistosella will not join the company for the mentioned position. Thereby, th… [+1092 chars]
